ingredients: 1 cup cooked white or brown rice (cooled)
3/4 cup breadcrumbs or panko (plus extra for coating)
steps: Preheat oven to 375Â°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and spray with cooking spray
If using fresh vegetables, steam broccoli and cauliflower until tender (5-7 min). If frozen, thaw and squeeze out excess moisture with paper towels
Add broccoli, cauliflower, carrot, and garlic to food processor. Pulse until finely chopped but not pureed (small rice-sized pieces)
Transfer vegetables to large bowl. Add cooked rice, eggs, cheese, breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder. Mix until well combined
Place extra breadcrumbs in shallow dish. Scoop 1-2 Tbsp of mixture and form into nugget shape. Roll in breadcrumbs to coat
Place nuggets on prepared baking sheet, spacing 1 inch apart. Spray tops lightly with cooking spray
Bake 15-18 minutes, flip, then bake another 12-15 minutes until golden brown and crispy
Cool 5 minutes before serving. Serve with ketchup, ranch, or honey mustard for dipping
title: Veggie Nuggets
